abstract_ssm: The Brooklyn Commuter Railroad and Subway collection measures 0.4 linear feet and spans the years 1853 to 1958. It is assembled of documents produced by many of the companies and organizations responsible for the development of Brooklyn and New York City's transportation infrastructure from the late-19th century to the mid-20th century.
